info.description: This is a sample server for AutoBan.
info.title: AutoBan API

post.description: Login a user with phone number and password
Logout a user by invalidating the refresh token
Logs out the user from all devices by invalidating all refresh tokens
Get new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Register a new user with phone number and password

get.description: Returns all active sessions for the authenticated user
Get a list of all users with pagination
Get the profile information of the authenticated user

put.description: Update the profile information of the authenticated user
Update the password of the authenticated user

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific user

delete.description: Delete a user from the system

post.description: Change the password of a user
Change the role of a user
Change the status of a user

new_password.description:
New password for the user (minimum 8 characters)
@Example NewPassword123

role.description:
New role for the user (User, Admin, SuperAdmin)
@Example Admin

status.description:
New status for the user (Active, Deactivated, Deleted)
@Example Active

dto.GetSessionsResponse.description: Response containing list of user sessions

password.description:
Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
@Example Password123

Password must be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
@Example Password123

dto.TokenResponse.description: User login response containing access and refresh tokens

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
